head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CAPLIN, HAROLD SHELDON

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CAPLIN, HAROLD SHELDON

block.p: CAPLIN-Harold Sheldon (76) passed away on September 21, 2000 in Newport Beach, CA. Beloved father of Barbara Eliran, Diane Leeder, Laura Ripston and William Caplin. Loving brother of Joseph Caplin and Rusty Meshel. Loving grandfather of Asher, Shira, Akiva, Shoshana, Nicholas, Ben and Sam. Funeral services 11:15 AM Sunday, September 24, 2000 at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 West 76th Street, New York, NY, 212-362-6600. Interment Westchester Hill Cemetery, Hastings-on Hudson, New York on Sunday September 24, 2000. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to IWMF Waldenstrom's Foundation 2300 Bee Ridge Road #
